name: INWAY
description: INWAY - a fascinating platformer that allows you to try yourself in complex tests, and its passing can take a lot of nerves!
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (or equivalent) Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: with 512 MB VRAM compatible with DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 120 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
